title: Power Cut schedule to continue : 2 hours & 15 minutes on Thursday (9)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka said that the proposed power cut schedule will continue on Thursday (9).
Accordingly, the supply of electricity will be suspended for a period of two hours and fifteen minutes.
Power Cut schedule to continue : 2 hours & 15 minutes on Thursday (9)
Electricity supply restored to several areas after early morning blackout
CEB Engineers Union decides to call off strike following talks with the President
